info.name: Task Management
info.description:
Task Management contains basic apis to manage tasks, It allows logged in user to view and create tasks. You will have to pass 'Bearer Token' which your received after logged in to the system. Here is the example:

\--header 'Authorization: Bearer 9|sG6Hy4eMMwRvD4Z0x3FRRNVDK6qrDYjumRxDtzBu'
